references.reason: This paper is foundational to the concept of robust clustering, which is a core theme of this paper on facility location with predictions.

references.paper_title: Learning-augmented mechanism design: Leveraging predictions for facility location
references.reason: This paper directly addresses mechanism design with predictions in the context of facility location, providing a direct comparison point for the current work.
This paper introduces a prediction model closely related to the MAC model in this paper, providing a relevant comparison and context for the methodology.

references.paper_title: Facility location problem with capacity constraints: Algorithmic and mechanism design perspectives
references.reason: This paper provides a baseline for the performance of facility location mechanism design without predictions, serving as a critical comparison for the results obtained with MAC predictions.

references.paper_title: On the power of deterministic mechanisms for facility location games
references.reason: This paper establishes fundamental limits on the approximation ratio achievable by deterministic mechanisms for facility location, which is crucial for evaluating the improvement offered by incorporating predictions.
